metadata.title: CVE-2023-34623 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered jtidy thru r938 allows attackers to cause a denialof service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that uses cyclicdependencies.

criterions.comment: jtidy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
